
== Introduction ==

SCORM is [http://www.adlnet.gov/Technologies/scorm/default.aspx ADL standard] for storing test results on the server (usually it is LMS).

All you need to do to include SCORM support is:
Upload scorm folder to you browser and  add this line to you HTML file:
{{{
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="scorm/APIWrapper.js"></script>
}}}

This javascript library contain script for SCORM communication.

== What will be send to the server ==
Currently only score is send to the server using:
  * cmi.core.score.max
  * cmi.core.score.raw
